Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Warren's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Warren assisted Merle and Martinez as Glenn and Maggie were set to be executed. However, the prisoners staged an ambush and Maggie killed Warren with a bone fragment, stabbing him in the throat. Later, the Governor was informed of Warren's death from Merle, which led him to send the Woodbury Army to search for the intruders.
Death[]: Killed By Maggie Greene Warren is stabbed in the throat by Maggie, using a bone from the walker that Glenn had killed in the interrogation room. It is assumed that he was put down before reanimation.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Warren has killed: Welles (Alive, Possibly, Direct or Caused) Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Trivia[]: Warren was not credited and was only named in dialogue. Philip Dido also portrayed a National Guardsman who was ironically killed by the Woodbury Army . Warren is Maggie Rhee 's first direct named human kill.
